trans-unit.source: Represents the location of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance specified with a unique network address configuration by describing the current instance of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> within the Peer-to-Peer Collaboration Infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Representa a localização de um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> instância especificada com uma configuração de endereço de rede único, pelo que descrevem a instância atual de um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> dentro da infraestrutura de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: A peer "endpoint" describes a contact's presence location — the unique network address configuration that describes the currently available instance of the contact within the peer collaboration network.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de rede "endpoint" descreve a localização de presença de um contacto — a configuração do endereço de rede exclusivos que descreve a instância atualmente disponível de contacto dentro da rede de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: A single contact can be available at multiple endpoints within the peer collaboration network.
trans-unit.target: Um contacto único pode estar disponível em vários pontos finais dentro da rede de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: A peer watching a contact can query any of the endpoints associated with that contact for specific peer presence, application, or object updates.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento observar um contacto pode consultar qualquer um dos pontos finais associados esse contacte presença de um elemento de rede específico, aplicações ou atualizações de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Generates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Gera uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> class with the peer-associated endpoint contained in <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> classe com o ponto final associado de elemento de rede contido no <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final associado o elemento de rede.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the peer-associated endpoint contained in and a string specifying endPointName.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe com o ponto final associado de elemento de rede contido no e especificar uma cadeia endPointName .

trans-unit.source: The endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final associado o elemento de rede.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o nome associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The endPoint argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: O endPoint argumento especifica .

trans-unit.source: The endPoint specified is not a valid IPv6 endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O endPoint especificado não é um ponto final de IPv6 válido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância com os parâmetros associados necessários para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O destino de serialização associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objeto e, opcionalmente, liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> that contains the IP address associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>que contém o endereço IP associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: To avoid corrupting the instance state, the caller should not change the EndPoint value if the instance was obtained from <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar corrupting o estado da instância, o autor da chamada não deve alterar o valor de ponto final se a instância foi obtida <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: IP address associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Endereço IP associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The specified EndPoint endpoint is not a valid IPv6 endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final do ponto final especificado não é um ponto final de IPv6 válido.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância de teste de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância fornecida tem correspondente dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> para <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para teste de igualdade.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> is equal to the specified object instance, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> é igual à instância do objeto especificado, pessoa <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> objects are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objetos são considerados iguais.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instances provided have matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instâncias fornecidas tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para uma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Um 32 bits com sinal código hash de número inteiro utilizado para comparar as instâncias deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class instance with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância de classe com os dados necessários para serializar especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo derivado tem de chamar o tipo base <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.String> that represents a displayed name for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.String>que representa um nome apresentado para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To avoid corrupting the instance state, the caller should not change the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint%2A> value if the instance was obtained from <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar corrupting o estado da instância, o autor da chamada não deve alterar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint%2A>valor se a instância foi obtida <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>ou <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> representing the display name of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>que representa o nome a apresentar o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Signaled when the name associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Assinalou quando o nome associado um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> alterações de objetos.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Called when a change occurs to the PeerName specified by the associated with the instance.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando ocorre uma alteração para o PeerName especificada pelo associados a instância.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of change that has occurred to the `PeerName`.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de alteração que tenha ocorrido para o `PeerName`.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific SynchronizingObject.
trans-unit.target: Quando este valor da propriedade está definida, todos os eventos não desencadeados como resultado de uma operação assíncrona terão os processadores do evento associado novamente chamados num thread que criou o SynchronizingObject específico.

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: O valor de conjunto predefinido para esta propriedade é `null`, que indica que todos os processadores de eventos são chamados num thread de conjunto de threads de sistema.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade normalmente, é definida para um elemento de IU como uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> interface e é utilizado por instâncias deste tipo de sincronização de processador de eventos no thread que o criou.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto chamado foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Populates the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance with the data obtained from the serialized source.
trans-unit.target: Preenche atual <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância com os dados obtidos a partir da origem serializada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>que representa um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> representing a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>que representa um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.
